short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delegates content filtering to Endpoint Protector Client application (endpointprotector.com).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helper extension, delegating browser contents to a specific data loss prevention filtering application in order to help businesses mitigate security risks for sensitive content.
